list.name: Balanced
list.content: To me, good design is about finding the right balance between data, empathy, and intuition. A user-focused and data-driven design may perform well but may lack the emotional touch at deeper level, while the aesthetically good looking digital product although touching the heart may not always meet consumers' needs. Thus a good design is the balance between the data-informed design with an aesthetic apprach.

list.name: Modular
list.content: I believe a system, be it a visual design or a software, subdivided into smaller parts becomes reusable, flexible, scalable and easy for others to contibute to.

list.name: Adaptive
list.content: A successful user interface, in my opinion, should be adaptive to different platforms. It should be responsive to different screen sizes and degrade or enhance its features accordingly.

list.name: Dynamic
list.content: To me, dynamism created with meaningful and well-arranged motion is the glue that ties all the elements of an interface together. It creates a continuity during user journey, which makes the experience more pleasant and the interface easier to understand.
